description: This file handles server-side rendering requests for a Remix application, managing responses for both browser and bot clients, and setting CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that processes incoming requests, distinguishes between bots and browsers, and returns appropriate server responses.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering when the request is identified as coming from a bot, streaming the rendered output.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering for browser clients, streaming the rendered output similarly to handleBotRequest.
